title: Feeders/afks
body:
How do I climb out of silver when i get games with afks and the team declines a remake, or I get inting bot laners with no runes?
I need help, seriously considering paying for boosting or kms? Im better than silver but Im stuck here because I cant carry 3 people??

replies.body:
Step 1. Don't complain on the forum like every other little bitch.

Step 2. Get better and win.

Step 3. Continue applying steps 1 and 2.
I hope i get into a game with you so i can troll you and see how you can carry a feeding a troll :P
Play in a duo, or just move over to 5man flex.
